title: New: Erik Jonasson – Autumn Falls
content:
Erik Jonasson’s beautiful debut, Like A Funeral, clocked up more than a million plays on Spotify within a matter of months, and his second offering, the equally as delicate, Autumn Falls, is likely to do the same.

Really somber yet sincere songwriting, all grounded by Jonasson’s otherworldly vocal, it’s the sound of heartbreak, yet also the sound of an artist truly hitting their stride. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
